policy: AWS CloudTrail bucket is publicly accessible
rule: $.resource[*].aws_cloudtrail exists and (($.resource[*].aws_cloudtrail[*].*[*].s3_bucket_name does not equal $.resource[*].aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block[*].*[*].bucket) or (($.resource[*].aws_cloudtrail[*].*[*].s3_bucket_name equals $.resource[*].aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block[*].*[*].bucket) and  ($.resource[*].aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block[*].*[*].block_public_acls isFalse or  $.resource[*].aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block[*].*[*].block_public_policy isFalse)))
